name: AFS Analytics for WooCommerce
author: AFS Analytics

sections.description:
Full featured Web Analytics solution with enhanced eCommerce support.
Easy to use, in addition or as an alternative to google analytics.

This version comes with enhanced WooCommerce support.

Monitor every aspect of your WooCommerce store

  • Monitor transactions, sales, carts, products performance and more …
  • See customer’s entire profile, activity and history.
  • Find out which Marketing Campaign generates the most revenue, and those performing poorly.
  • See which search terms are the most profitable.
  • Follow in real time multiple KPI.
  • Access to multiple reports updated in real time from within your WordPress dashboard.

Also includes advanced Analytics features

  • Heatmaps
  • Detailed user profile
  • Predictive analytics
  • Events tracking (AutoTrack)
  • SEO Keyword rank tracker tool

Live demo

A live demo is freely accessible from the plugin (no account required).
sections.installation:
1. Install AFS Analytics plugin either via the WordPress plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. From your WordPress admin dashboard, choose to create a free account or, if you already have one, to link it.
  4. Access to your website statistics through the AFS Analytics link on WordPress menu.

Need additional help?
Please use our support contact form
or contact us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/afsanalytics
sections.faq:
How long before I start seeing analytics?

Immediately, our dashboard provides real-time analytics.

Is there a live demo available?

A live demo is freely accessible from the plugin.
sections.changelog:
2.18

  • WordPress 6.3 support.
  • WooCommerce 8.0 support.

2.17

  • WordPress 6.2.2 support.
  • WooCommerce 7.7.0 support.

2.16

  • WordPress 6.1.1 support.
  • WooCommerce 7.4.0 support.

2.15

  • WordPress 6.1 support.
  • WooCommerce 7.0.1 support.

2.14

  • WordPress 6.0 support.
  • WooCommerce 6.5.1 support.

2.13

  • WooCommerce fix.

2.12

  • WordPress 5.9 support.
  • WooCommerce 5.9 support.

2.11

  • Added ability to hide own visits via settings.
  • WordPress 5.8.1 support.
  • WooCommerce 5.7.1 support.

2.10

  • WordPress 5.8 support.
  • WooCommerce 5.6.0 support.

2.09

  • WooCommerce 5.3.0 support.

2.08

  • WordPress 5.7 support.
  • WooCommerce 5.1.0 support.
  • Embedded dashboard optimizations.

2.07

  • WooCommerce 4.7.0 support.
  • Minor fixes.

2.06

  • WordPress 5.5 support.
  • WooCommerce 4.4.1 support.
  • Login process simplification.
  • Improved WooCommerce checkout steps detection.
  • Added fr_CA and fr_BE localization files.

2.05

  • Added Gravatar support.
  • WooCommerce 4.3.0 support.
  • Fixed bug occurring when setting some GDPR options.

2.03

Fixed embedded dashboard access denied error.

2.02

  • Improved account creation workflow.
  • WooCommerce 4.2.0 support
  • Better handling of WooCommerce products with no sku.

2.01

Fixed nginx unsupported function call.

2.0

Major rewrite.
Now includes a full featured dashboard right inside your admin dashboard,
as well as a Today Trends Summary widget.

short_description: Advanced eCommerce Analytics solution. Grow your online business by measuring user satisfaction and site efficiency.
